posts.title: List of all the zeronet websites
posts.body: I have done my best job at rounding up all of the sites on zero net and putting them on one page sorted into categories. You can see the list here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/17WUZGKQ1AhZLT8vENfWKb3ZvsrCAscsKg/listofsites.html

posts.title: Send me a message!
posts.body: You can send me a message at BM-2cUCQ4MtfcQQXyuZ9HvNi2q7gzuYLgN4sM on bitmessage

posts.title: Why Zeronet is so cool
posts.body:
Because it lets anyone run there own website without needing expensive servers. This is huge for free speech because not everyone can afford to pay for a server to run there website. 

Im going to start posting more content here soon.

posts.title: This thing really needs pictures.
posts.body:
This thing seems pretty cool so far but really needs the ability to post pictures. Or maybe its already there and I haven't worked it out yet.

Also I seem to be using this blog like twitter :P
